agentic_rag documentation
=========================

Overview
--------

agentic_rag is a RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) project that integrates
Azure OpenAI, LangChain, FAISS, and CrewAI flows. It provides:

- A RAG tool using Azure embeddings and a FAISS vector store
- A flow that validates question relevance then answers with a RAG crew
- Optional evaluation utilities with RAGAS

--------

   :caption: Table of Contents
